insert into line_pat_rec
patAreaCount,
finishAreaCount, createTime,
startTime,
plId,
ptId,
finish
values
#{patAreaCount},
0, now(),
#{startTime},
#{plId},
#{ptId},
0
mapper.select: select count(*) from line_pat_rec where plId=#{plId} and ptId=#{ptId} and date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
select id from line_pat_rec where plId=#{plId} and ptId=#{ptId} and date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: update line_pat_rec set finishAreaCount=finishAreaCount+1 where id=#{id}
update line_pat_rec set endTime=now(),finish=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) count,finish from patrol_plan pp,line_pat_rec lpr where CONCAT(',',pp.plIds,',') like CONCAT('%,',lpr.plId,',%') and pp.startDate between DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) and current_date() and pp.ptId=#{ptId} group by finish

select pl.name plName,finishAreaCount/patAreaCount*100 finishPercent from line_pat_rec lpr,patrol_line pl where lpr.plId=pl.id and date_format(lpr.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) and current_date() and ptId=#{ptId}
select count(*) from line_pat_rec where date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') and finish=1 and ptId=#{ptId}
